original_solution_mapping.L2: With the 4 that were already ripe, there will be 14 peaches that have ripened.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Three were eaten, so there will be 14 - 3 = <<14-3=11>>11 ripe peaches left.
original_solution_mapping.L5: Therefore, there will be 11 - 4 = <<11-4=7>>7 more ripe peaches than unripe peaches in the bowl after five days.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 6314.
    Returns: the difference between ripe and unripe peaches after five days.
    """
    # L1
    ripen_per_day = 2 # two more ripen every day
    days = 5 # after five days
    peaches_ripened_over_days = ripen_per_day * days

    # L2 (Implicit calculation, not a separate logical step)
    initial_ripe_peaches = 4 # Four of the peaches are ripe
    total_ripened_before_eaten = peaches_ripened_over_days + initial_ripe_peaches

    # L3
    eaten_on_third_day = 3 # three are eaten
    ripe_peaches_left = total_ripened_before_eaten - eaten_on_third_day

    # L4
    total_peaches_in_bowl = 18 # A bowl of fruit holds 18 peaches
    unripe_peaches_left = total_peaches_in_bowl - total_ripened_before_eaten

    # L5
    difference_ripe_unripe = ripe_peaches_left - unripe_peaches_left

    # FA
    answer = difference_ripe_unripe
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Three were eaten, so there will be {total_ripened_before_eaten} - {eaten_on_third_day} = <<{total_ripened_before_eaten}-{eaten_on_third_day}={ripe_peaches_left}>>{ripe_peaches_left} ripe peaches left.

Therefore, there will be {ripe_peaches_left} - {unripe_peaches_left} = <<{ripe_peaches_left}-{unripe_peaches_left}={difference_ripe_unripe}>>{difference_ripe_unripe} more ripe peaches than unripe peaches in the bowl after five days.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Three were eaten, so there will be 12 - 3 = <<12-3=9>>9 ripe peaches left.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L5: Therefore, there will be 9 - 6 = <<9-6=3>>3 more ripe peaches than unripe peaches in the bowl after five days.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'ripen_per_day' (value: 2) was used instead of 'initial_ripe_peaches' (value: 4).
